source.21c9ed62:
import chardet
with open(file, 'rb') as rawdata:
    result = chardet.detect(rawdata.read(100000))
result
source.af83d026: Step 1: Try to load the .csv file using [pd.read_csv()](https://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/reference/api/pandas.read_csv.html)
source.32edca49: Step 2: If you get a unicode decode error then next you need to [try to determine what the character encoding is](https://chardet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
source.923062e6: Step 3: Now you can manually define the encoding in [pd.read_csv()](https://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/reference/api/pandas.read_csv.html)
